p: Minitab 16 (Minitab Inc., State College, PA, USA) was used for the statistical analysis of the obtained data. One-way variances (ANOVA) and Tukey’s test were used to analyze the data with a significance level of p < 0.05. The data are interpreted as a mean ± standard deviation (SD). Multivariate data analysis was carried out using SIMCA P + 14.0 (Umetrics, Umeå, Sweden) software where the pareto scaling method was applied.
